# `LexSlot` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | `string` | Yes | The slot name |
| description | `string` | No | The slot description |
| type | `string` | Yes | The slot type |
| priority | `number` | No | The priority of the slot |
